actions.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 313 - 109 (Roll no. 259).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 313 - 109 (Roll no. 259).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. DeFazio.

description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to prohibit any funds appropriated to the Job Corps program from being used to either alter or terminate the Interagency Agreement between the U.S. Departments of Labor and Agriculture that governs the Job Corps Civilian Conservation Center (CCC) program.
purpose: Amendment prohibits any funds appropriated to the Job Corps program from being used to either alter or terminate the Interagency Agreement between the U.S. Departments of Labor and Agriculture that governs the Job Corps Civilian Conservation Center (CCC) program.
